text: Adenanthellum is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family, Asteraceae described as a genus in 1979.Nordenstam, Rune Bertil. 1979. Botaniska Notiser 132: 160Tropicos, Adenanthellum B. Nord. There is only one known species, Adenanthellum osmitoides, endemic to South Africa.The Plant List, Adenanthellum osmitoides (Harv.) B.Nord.Gibbs Russell, G. E., W. G. M. Welman, E. Retief, K. L. Immelman, G. Germishuizen, B. J. Pienaar, M. Van Wyk & A. Nicholas. 1987. List of species of southern African plants. Memoirs of the Botanical Survey of South Africa 2(1–2): 1–152(pt. 1), 1–270(pt. 2). ==References== Category:Monotypic Asteraceae genera Category:Endemic flora of South Africa
title: Adenanthellum
